```{r}
# Make data
set.seed(123)
sales_data_tbl <- tibble(
  date  = seq.Date(from = ymd("2018-01-01"), to = today(), length.out = 90),
  class = sample(c("marketing", "sales", "research"), size = 90, replace = TRUE),
  sales = runif(n = 90, min = 1, max = 100)
)
```
